name: Stewardess & Flight Attendants
description:
This game is about Stewardess & Flight Attendants crazy job duty and dressUp on plane. Stewardess is a women who is employed to look after the passengers on plane. For the quality services of any airline, Stewardess has to pay a big attention to their passengers so they do not have any complain. Girls and women , get ready to be the best flight attendant. Dress Up in a very decent way and serve the passengers with smile. Enjoy the flight attendant lifestyle by traveling around the world.

It is your job duty to help the passengers and listen to your flight pilot & managers instructions. Passengers usually need flight attendants help from check-in to the plane landing. Flight attendants are world traveler and can explore the world. If it is your dream to fly around the world then you should join as a flight attendant. However Pilots and airport managers can also fly around the world when they are performing their job responsibilities.

In this free airport plane flight attendants game, flight attendants can dress up their uniform. They have to makeup and take shower with spa as well.

Features:

-> Cook the delicious food for passengers in this plane
-> Make some nice drinks and juices to serve the passengers
-> sandwich and pasta with cold drinks can make your passengers and pilot of flight more happy
-> Flight attendants need to carry on their suitcases
-> You can clean the hug mess left by passengers in the plane
-> Take care of the departure & landing time in flight
-> Instruct your passengers to fasten their seat belts for safety
-> Humbly ask your passengers to switch off their mobile phones when plane is ready to fly
-> If passengers have injury in plane , take them to the doctor
-> Flight attendants are ready to fly for exotic destinations of the world
-> Wash and clean the plane , check up for plane is important before fly
-> Get your passengers to have stamp on their passport by immigration officer
-> Immigration officers should be polite with passengers


You can enjoy the makeup , makeover and dressUp for flight attendants in this free airport manager flight attendants game. Every flight attendant will like to work in famous airline company.

Do not forget to play all of our other free casual, entertainment, sports, adventure, role-playing games where you can have fun, learn and play makeup babies and dress up games for girls and kids.


TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
